requirements_en.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7
  • Processor: Intel i3
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 250 MB available space
requirements_en.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel i5
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • DirectX: Version 11
